Comments: In the song “Million Miles An Hour,” Nickelback takes listeners on a wild ride; “trippin balls” and “tasting colors.”
Filled with amazing audio effects, this is a song perfect for parties and stoners…. or stoner parties. We don’t judge man. Don’t forget the pizza!
